rows.label: tlk70000029_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, I never imagined I'd
live to see our glorious
city in such a state...

rows.label: tlk70000029_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But our great king did not let
himself be cowed by such nonsense.

rows.label: tlk70000029_02_msg0003
rows.name:
He sent the castle guards to support the
reconstruction effort and provided
plentiful supplies from his stockpile.

rows.label: tlk70000029_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Thanks to his resolve and generosity,
we are able to rebuild our lives. Surely
his actions will go down in history!

rows.label: tlk70000029_02_msg0005
rows.name:
I want to support the king
in the only way I know: keeping
his gardens impeccable.

rows.label: tlk70000029_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Now I think of that, where's
that idiot son of mine?
